title: A Mystery Revealed
opening: The surprising truth from Xane was a shock to Marth. Tiki was created as the daughter of the Divine Dragon King, Naga, and slept in the temple because of the king's will. The king's fear of Tiki's power was that of a loving mother's. If Tiki was to awaken, her tremendous power would eventually cause the destruction of the world... That is what the Divine Dragon King feared. However, Bantu, the king's servant, became attached to Tiki after watching over her for a period of hundreds of years became(sic). He awoke her from her sleep, and took her away. So Tiki only had 10 human years' worth of memory... "That is so sad, Tiki..." Marth was too bewildered to think.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: This is the Ice Dragons' Temple. Anri's final destination...

intro.speaker: Gotoh
intro.line: Prince Marth, can you hear me? Come to the front of the center room. I shall await you there.

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: What!? You found all the shards? Thank you, then the Starsphere can be restored. Please wait a moment...

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: Marth, this is the Starsphere. You can take this with you as well.

battle-talk.speaker: Marth
battle-talk.line: Huh? Gotoh, why are you giving such an important item to me?

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: The only person that can restore the Shield of Seals is you... The Shield, itself, has chosen you.

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: You still don't understand? The Emblem shield you're carrying is the stolen Shield of Seals. To be honest, it was only recently that I noticed; its exterior had completely changed... After stealing it from the Fane of Raman, the thief removed its jewels and sold them off as treasures. The money was used to fund an army, which, along with three stolen weapons, was used to conquer the world. The thief that went on to become the king of Archanea had the shield, which brought him such good fortune, it became the emblem of his royal family. Now do you understand, Marth? It is what you are carrying, Archanea's Fire Emblem.

battle-talk.speaker: Marth
battle-talk.line: !! What... ...The first king of Archanea was originally a thief!? Is that true...? In that case, I can kind of understand the curse of the Fire Emblem... Then, Gotoh... If I can collect all five orbs, can I restore the Shield of Seals?

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: Mmm... But please hurry up. The shield has already been broken for 600 years... It is almost time for the Earth Dragons, sealed underneath Macedon, to awaken from their slumber. Those evil Earth Dragons number several hundreds... No, several thousands. Once they awaken there will be nothing that we can do... I will leave Tiki in your care. You can find her in the room to the right. That Divine Dragon child should be able to help you battle the Earth Dragons. But, I will state clearly, if the Shield of Seals is not restored, Tiki will be destroyed.

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: That child is still developing. Without the Shield of Seals she will begin to degenerate. Eventually she will become wild and attack humans. I made her sleep, because I felt sad for her. But, if the Shield of Seals is restored I will no longer have to worry, because the shield will protect Tiki. Marth, please take care of Tiki. You must rescue that child from the path of ruin.

battle-talk.speaker: Gotoh
battle-talk.line: Is that so. You couldn’t find them all... There’s nothing you can do about it... Please hand your collected shards to me. Tiki is sleeping in the room to the right. But since the shield isn’t restored, I can’t let you see her. That child is still developing. Without the Shield of Seals she will begin to degenerate. Eventually she will become wild and attack humans. I cannot allow Tiki to awaken again. It is for her own good... Marth, once you’ve obtained all the treasures, head to the room to the left. I will be waiting for you...

recruit-talk.speaker: Marth
recruit-talk.line: Tiki, it's me, Marth. Hey, open your eyes!

recruit-talk.speaker: Tiki
recruit-talk.line: ...Marth... .....! Oh Marth!! You came! You came to see Tiki!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Marth
recruit-talk.line: Yes, I hadn't seen Tiki in a long time. Are you feeling well?

recruit-talk.speaker: Tiki
recruit-talk.line: Uh... No. The bishop told me that I had to sleep again. But I don't want to... Because when I sleep I'm always alone. During my sleep, I dreamt many nightmares. There, I became a wild dragon, like those poor Fire Dragons and Ice Dragons. I attacked humans, and I killed them. No... No... When I awoke I was all alone in the dark room... I felt so strange, but also very scared... So very scared... But I couldn't leave that room. I cried many times, and then Uncle Bantu would come to comfort me as usual. One day he took me away, and took me to a human village. Living in that village was very fun, and everybody treated me well... In the short time, until I was discovered by Gharnef, I felt really happy. I don't want to sleep anymore... I feel that if I close my eyes once more, I will be unable to open them ever again. I don't want that. I want to live with everyone, I don't want to sleep again!

recruit-talk.speaker: Marth
recruit-talk.line: Tiki, it's alright now. I will protect you, so don't cry...

recruit-talk.speaker: Tiki
recruit-talk.line: Really...? I won't need to see those scary dreams again!?

recruit-talk.speaker: Marth
recruit-talk.line: That's right! Once the shield is restored, Tiki can live together with the rest of us. Don't worry, believe in me!

recruit-talk.speaker: Tiki
recruit-talk.line: Ah! I'm so happy!! Thank you, Marth!

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: I see... So Tiki was pretty happy. It must have been very painful for her. Though it was to protect her, I was far too cruel to her. I suspect she must really hate me... You should go, Marth. I will send you to Altea with my powers.

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: You should go, Marth. I will send you to Altea with my powers.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Lord Gotoh, why don't you come with us?

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: Hmm... At the moment I've one thing I must still investigate. Gharnef has returned.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Gharnef...!? But we killed him!

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: Yes, you killed his body. But his soul was held prisoner by the Darksphere, and within it, his hatred only grew. Afterwards, his former disciples--the heretic bishops--resurrected him. And they seem to be planning something foul.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I see. Very well, Lord Gotoh. We shall split ways here.

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: Indeed. If I find something, then I too will visit Altea afterwards. I'm counting on you, Marth. Everything rests on your shoulders. You must save both our races from the path of destruction.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: ...Altea, home at last. Though you may be occupied by Archanea... I will get you back, I swear.

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Boy, what a serious lady. Hey, Kris. You said you're Marth's Royal Guard, right?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. My mission is to protect Prince Marth.

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: I see. But if you really plan on protectin' him, then you need the strength to match your conviction. Hey, do you wanna know a way to get stronger?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Hm? You know of a way?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: ...At long last, Altea. My dearest home... Archanean occupation be damned; I will get you back, I swear it!

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Boy, what a serious fella. Hey, Kris. You said you're Marth's Royal Guard, right?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. My mission is to protect Prince Marth at all costs.

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: I see. But if you really plan on protectin' him, then you're gonna need the strength to back up your conviction. Hey, do you wanna know a way to get stronger?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Huh? Do you know how to?

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: 'Course, just hold on a second.

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Ta-da! Kris, you know about Tiki, right? Tiki's still a kid, but the real reason she can fight is because of her hairstyle and tiara.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Wait, what?! Are you serious?!

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Yeah, if you wear your hair like this, then you'll be that much stronger. So all you gotta do is wear this tiara, and wear your hair like Tiki. If you do that, then a legendary power will flow through you! ...Well, maybe. So? Do you wanna give it a try?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sure, why not?

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Alrighty then. I'll be sure to do this properly.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Thank you, Sir Xane!

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: ......You aren't doubting me? Is this trust or naivete...?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Is something the matter, Sir Xane?

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Ah, no, it's nothin'. Well, see you around. I'm looking forward to your new look!

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, that's quite alright. I want to protect Prince Marth with my own strength.

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Hmm, that so? Boring.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Huh? What do you mean "boring"?

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Ah, no, it's nothin'. Catch you later!
